partialIngredients.reason: Buying large piece this week for curry. Ginger keeps 2-3 weeks in fridge or freezes well. Korean Ground Beef next week also uses ginger.
Buying 10 this week. If any remain after chili + curry + pate, they carry into next week for Korean beef + Cacciatore.
Buying full bottle this week. Korean beef and Cacciatore don't need it, but it'll be restocked for future recipes.
~20-22 packets from mega batch. Korean Ground Beef next week will use 4-5 oz (for ~2.5 lbs beef at 2 oz/lb).
3 cans on hand, chili uses 2. 1 can carries over for Chicken Cacciatore next week (may need 1 more).

notes: Week 9: No-Bean Chili + Coconut Lime Chicken Curry + Organ Pate mega batch. Shopping list and cooking tasks created in ClickUp Feb 20. Week 10: Taco Beef Bowls (easy) + Greek Beef & Potato Skillet (normal). Both approved by Ben Feb 20. No Korean beef - too similar to Asian stir-fry in freezer.
